description:
Sasakibe Choujirou works underneath http://anidb.net/ch9307 [Genryuusai Yamamoto] as vice-captain of the first protection squad. He has a large interest in Western culture and likes to make tea from his own grown tealeaves. Sasakibe`s zanpakutou is named http://anidb.net/ch10821 [Gonryoumaru].
Source: Anime-Planet
name: Sasakibe Choujirou
